name: papermerge
description: [{{ project_name|capitalize }}]({{ project_url }}) is an open source document management system (DMS) primarily designed for archiving and retrieving your digital documents. Instead of having piles of paper documents all over your desk, office or drawers - you can quickly scan them and configure your scanner to directly upload to Papermerge DMS."

volumes.description: Storage location for all papermerge data files.

title: Papermerge
